hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT task.ID as {task.id}, task.REPLICATION_MODE as {task.replicationMode}, task.CREATION_DATE as {task.creationDate}, task.STATE_CODE as {task.state}, task.OWNER_ID as {task.ownerId}, task.OWNER_FIO as {task.ownerFIO}, task.DEPARTMENTS as {task.departmentIdsInternal}, task.REPORT_START_DATE as {task.result.startDate}, task.REPORT_END_DATE as {task.result.endDate}, task.TOTAL_RECORDS as {task.result.sourceTotalRecordsCount}, task.SOURCE_SUCCESS as {task.result.sourceProcessedRecordsCount}, task.DEST_UPDATED as {task.result.destinationUpdatedRecordsCount}, task.DEST_INSERED as {task.result.destinationInseredRecordsCount}, task.SOURCE_ERRORS as {task.result.sourceFailedRecordsCount}, -- отчеты игнорируем, слишком большие null as {task.result.report}, null as {task.result.destinationInseredRecordsReport}, null as {task.result.destinationInseredDecentrRecordsReport}, null as {task.result.destinationUpdatedRecordsReport}, null as {task.result.errorFormatReport}, null as {task.result.errorParentReport} FROM DEPARTMENTS_REPLICA_TASKS task ORDER BY task.ID DESC
